container-title: B. The school is built "campus" style and is a high school. All buildings are considered one
title: A site is ONE school building. Here are the guidelines for determining a building: A. All classes are in one building

container-title: In small districts where several levels of schools are in one building
note: all levels combined are application considered one building if the total student population is under 2000.
title: Post high school: The entire campus is one building if number of students is under 2000. site license E
